APP.CLAIM: Dive in into the wonderful world of Element

PRODUCTIVE_DATA.TITLE: Productive data
PRODUCTIVE_DATA.CONTENT: You are about to connect to productive data. Please note that changes will take effect immediately.

FORM.ACCEPT_NO_PRIVACY: I confirm that I do not care about my privacy.
FORM.ACCEPT_TERMS_DESCRIPTION: I confirm that I accept all and everything.
FORM.ACCEPT_TERMS_REQUIRED: You need to accept all terms before joining.
FORM.ADD_ENTITY_TEXT: Add a new entity with the button below.
FORM.DEPARTURE_AFTER_ARRIVAL: The departure time must be after arrival.
FORM.END_BEFORE_START: End date cannot be before start date.
FORM.INPUT_HELP_DESCRIPTION: The content should be short and concise, optionally with links to more detailed information available elsewhere, or any other interactive element needed to complete the task.
FORM.MINLENGTH: A minimum length of {{requiredLength}} characters is required.
FORM.NAME_REQUIRED: Every good form needs a name!
FORM.NAME_UPPERCASE: A name must start with an uppercase letter.
FORM.NAME: Name
FORM.NOT_EIGHTEEN: You need to be at least 18 years old.

THEME_EDITOR.UPLOAD_WARNING_TEXT: By uploading a theme you will lose your current unsaved changes and override any themes with the same name.
THEME_EDITOR.UPLOAD_MAX_FILES_REACHED: Only one theme can be uploaded at a time
